statements: SELECT * FROM IntellectualPropertyRights;
SELECT id, property_name, expiration_date FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT owner_name, expiration_date FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT property_name, owner_name FROM IntellectualPropertyRights ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM IntellectualPropertyRights;
SELECT id, property_name, owner_name FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE reminder_sent = true;
SELECT property_name, owner_name FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY owner_name ASC, property_name DESC;
SELECT id, owner_name FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND reminder_sent = false;
SELECT owner_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Properties FROM IntellectualPropertyRights GROUP BY owner_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY Total_Properties DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_rights;
SELECT id, property_name FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE renewal_status = TRUE;
SELECT property_name, expiration_date FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE expiration_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property_rights ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, property_name ASC;
SELECT r.reminder_message, ip.property_name FROM reminders r JOIN intellectual_property_rights ip ON r.intellectual_property_id = ip.id;
SELECT id, property_name, expiration_date, renewal_status FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE expiration_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, expiration_date FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE renewal_status = TRUE AND property_name LIKE '%patent%' LIMIT 5;

SELECT id, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM reminders INNER JOIN intellectual_property_rights ON reminders.intellectual_property_id = intellectual_property_rights.id WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, property_name, renewal_status FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE expiration_date < NOW() OR property_name = 'Trademark' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE renewal_status = FALSE AND property_name NOT LIKE '%copyright%';
SELECT id, name, expiration_date, renewal_status FROM IntellectualProperty;
SELECT name, expiration_date, renewal_status, id FROM IntellectualProperty;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualProperty WHERE renewal_status = true;
SELECT id, reminder_date FROM Reminder ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT id, notification_date FROM NotificationLog WHERE notification_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM IntellectualProperty;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date, renewal_status FROM IntellectualProperty WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, renewal_status FROM IntellectualProperty WHERE renewal_status = TRUE ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT Reminder.id, Reminder.reminder_date, IntellectualProperty.name FROM Reminder JOIN IntellectualProperty ON Reminder.intellectual_property_id = IntellectualProperty.id;

SELECT DISTINCT NotificationLog.notification_date, IntellectualProperty.name FROM NotificationLog JOIN Reminder ON NotificationLog.reminder_id = Reminder.id JOIN IntellectualProperty ON Reminder.intellectual_property_id = IntellectualProperty.id ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualPropertyRights;
SELECT id, property_name FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE renewal_due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT property_name, renewal_due_date FROM IntellectualPropertyRights ORDER BY renewal_due_date DESC;
SELECT id, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM ExpiringRightsReminders ORDER BY reminder_date ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE renewal_due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, property_name FROM IntellectualPropertyRights ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM AuditTrail WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT e.id, e.reminder_date, i.property_name FROM ExpiringRightsReminders e JOIN IntellectualPropertyRights i ON e.intellectual_property_id = i.id WHERE e.reminder_date > NOW();
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.event_type FROM Users u LEFT JOIN AuditTrail a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.event_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE renewable = TRUE;
SELECT ipr_name, start_date, end_date FROM IntellectualPropertyRights ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RightsRenewalReminders WHERE reminder_date >= '2022-08-01';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message, notification_date FROM UserNotifications ORDER BY notification_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM IntellectualPropertyRights LIMIT 5;
SELECT ipr_id, ipr_name, start_date, end_date FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE renewable = TRUE;
SELECT Users.username, UserNotifications.notification_message, UserNotifications.notification_date FROM Users JOIN UserNotifications ON Users.user_id = UserNotifications.user_id;
SELECT Users.username, RightsRenewalHistory.renewal_date, Users.phone_number FROM Users JOIN RightsRenewalHistory ON Users.user_id = RightsRenewalHistory.renewed_by;
SELECT DISTINCT ipr_name, start_date, end_date FROM IntellectualPropertyRights WHERE end_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
